name: Over the Moon
description:
Made by Keron Sepp and Roberta Elisabeth Kollo

Programming: Keron Sepp

Game Design, story, ideas: Roberta Elisabeth Kollo

This game is a short-adventure that takes place in different places and allows player to discover and explore to find a way out of different situations.

This game has no violence and is suitable for children.

Assets used in game are from Unity.Asset store.
